title.rendered: How to Read the Bible Resources

content.rendered:
These are some resources I produced for a talk entitled “How to Read the Bible”.

  • My original notes – my complete thoughts that were edited for the talk
  • The notes for the talk – this is only half of the talk – the other half was done by someone else
  • A quick Bible Quiz – to get things going
  • Bible Resources Sheet – pointers to useful tools to help with Bible Study
  • A Bible Treasure Hunt – to help you get stuck in
